segments.text: Oh, look at those kids sneaking cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is up on that little stool, grabbing handfuls like a little adventurer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, all excited and reaching for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, with the mom not even noticing behind them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how they're teaming up for this cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is huge, stuffed full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, that stool is tipping; he might fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the sink is overflowing water everywhere, what a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just polishing that plate, oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, all tidy and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, seeing the kids' mischief makes me smile despite the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're having such innocent fun, even if it's naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with a few cookies before anything goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
